featured.text: David Smith refers to himself as having been “a clothes addict,” because _________.
“I was a clothes addict,” he jokes.

definition.zh_def: 對某種物質或行為有強烈依賴的人，通常無法自我控制。
definition.en_def: A person who is dependent on a substance or behavior, often unable to control their use.
definition.example: He became an addict after years of using drugs.
